Package edu.wpi.grip.ui.pipeline

Class ConnectionView

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.shape.Shape
        • javafx.scene.shape.CubicCurve
          • edu.wpi.grip.ui.pipeline.ConnectionView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    public class ConnectionView
extends javafx.scene.shape.CubicCurve
    A JavaFX shape that renders itself as a curve connecting two sockets. This is used to show when outputs are connected to which inputs between different steps in the pipeline.a
